entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Moosomin
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:49 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Broadview 04:00 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022
Temperature: -1.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -2.7°C
Wind: WSW 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Freezing rain. Temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning. Freezing rain beginning this afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h becoming east 20 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 15 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with ice pellets ending overnight then cloudy. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Cloudy. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 14. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022
